data.name: Skeletal Skism - Blood Pack
data.detailed_description:
The Blood Pack Includes:
- Blood Emblem
- Blood Throne
- Blood Tombstone
- Blood Headstone
- Blood Angel of Death
- Blood Skeleton King
- Blood Ranged Minion
- Blood Melee Minion
data.about_the_game:
The Blood Pack Includes:
- Blood Emblem
- Blood Throne
- Blood Tombstone
- Blood Headstone
- Blood Angel of Death
- Blood Skeleton King
- Blood Ranged Minion
- Blood Melee Minion
data.short_description: Blood Emblem | Blood Structures | Blood Units

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10, 64-bit versions only.
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, and DX12-capable GPUs
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: Metal-capable Intel and AMD GPUs
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+ or Vulkan-capable, Nvidia and AMD GPUs.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
